entities.name: the white tomb
entities.description: The White Tomb 605 is mentioned as a location.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is being offered protection by the Ministry.

entities.name: the ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is offering Harry protection and is led by Scrimgeour.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is the head of the Ministry delegation and has a cold tone towards Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort wants to kill Harry himself and Aurors won't stop him.

entities.name: aurors
entities.description: Aurors are a group of wizards who work for the Ministry.

entities.name: stan shunpike
entities.description: Stan Shunpike is mentioned as someone who has not been released yet.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is Harry's mentor and is implied to be behind the Ministry's actions.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a member of the Ministry delegation.

relationships.description: Voldemort wants to kill Harry himself.
Aurors won't stop Voldemort from killing Harry.
Scrimgeour has a cold tone towards Harry.
Stan Shunpike is detained by the Ministry.
Percy is a member of the Ministry delegation.
